MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CH3 postcode area of Waverton, affecting properties in Ringway, Fox Lane, Egg Bridge Lane and the surrounding area. This is causing flickering and reduced power and repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:15AM on 20th January 2021
